content: free crochet plant hanger pattern this pretty and practical hanging plant holder is a quick project that can be whipped up in an evening or two by an intermediate crocheter it also makes a lovely gift especially if you include a potted plant dimensions about 20 inches tall and 7 inches wide can fit pots with diameters of 4 - 6 inches materials ● ~ 120 yards worsted weight yarn in any color s ● 5 mm crochet hook ● scissors ● tapestry needle ● key ring notes i used three colors for this plant hanger but it would be beautiful all in one color as well dig out your bag of scraps and get creative pattern 1 work a magic_ring and into it work chain 6 counts as double_crochet and chain 3 3 double_crochet chain 3 4 times 2 double_crochet join with slip_stitch to 3rd chain of beg chain 6 pull magic_ring tight 2 slip_stitch into chain space chain 3 2 double_crochet chain 3 3 double_crochet in chain space dc3tog over next 3 st 3 double_crochet chain 3 3 double_crochet in chain space 4 times dc3tog over last 3 st slip_stitch to beg chain 3 slip_stitch into next st chain 1 bpdc around same st skip next st 3 double_crochet chain 3 3 double_crochet in chain space skip next st bpdc around next st skip next st fphdc around dc3tog skip next st bpdc around next st skip next st 5 times omitting last bpdc and last skip st slip_stitch to beg bpdc 4 slip_stitch into next st chain 2 counts as half_double_crochet half_double_crochet in next st skip next st 3 double_crochet chain 3 3 double_crochet in chain space skip next st half_double_crochet in next 2 st dc3tog over next 3 st half_double_crochet in next 2 st skip next st 5 times omitting last 2 half_double_crochet and last skip st slip_stitch to beg half_double_crochet 5 slip_stitch into next st chain 1 bpdc around same st bpdc around next 2 st skip next st 3 double_crochet chain 3 3 5 double_crochet in chain space skip next st bpdc around next 3 st skip next st fphdc around dc3tog skip next st bpdc around next 3 st skip next st 5 times omitting last 3 bpdc and last skip st slip_stitch to beg bpdc 6 slip_stitch into next st chain 2 counts as half_double_crochet half_double_crochet in next 3 st skip next st 3 double_crochet chain 3 3 double_crochet in chain space skip next st half_double_crochet in next 4 st dc3tog over next 3 st half_double_crochet in next 4 st skip next st 5 times omitting last 4 half_double_crochet and last skip st slip_stitch to beg half_double_crochet 7 slip_stitch into next st chain 1 bpdc around same st bpdc around next 4 st skip next st 3 double_crochet chain 3 3 double_crochet in chain space skip next st bpdc around next 5 st skip next st fphdc around dc3tog skip next st bpdc around next 5 st skip next st 5 times
